name: Crazy Taxi: Fare Wars
description:
Steal fares right out of your friend's cab or make them crash as you gun it for big tips. This is no ordinary cab ride, this is war!
To download the manual in PDF format, go to www.sega.com/manuals/PSP/CrazyTaxiFareWars
